name: GyroSports
overview:
GyroSports.com is a FREE sports Contest site launching simultaneously with the 2011 College Basketball Tournament.

Imagine if you could take the nationâ€™s pulse on every major sporting event.

Now imagine taking the pulse not of the general population, but a group of people who have proven their expertise in any given sport.

You donâ€™t have to imagine anymore. The answer, GyroSports.com.

GyroSports runs on sophisticated computer algorithms. But at its heart, GyroSports is a free sports contest site thatâ€™s fun for everyone and easy to use.

Hereâ€™s how it works:

For the 2011 College Basketball Tournament, thousands of players will log on and make ONE pick every round. Itâ€™s that simple â€“ no need to fill out entire brackets or pick a ton of games. GyroSports only wants your very best pick.

GyroSports tracks the results as contestants separate themselves from the pack. GyroSports tells you who is undefeated, who is worth following, and who specializes in specific teams.

Of course youâ€™ll be gunning to nail every pick and win the $5,000 cash grand prize. (Tiebreakers are included). But youâ€™ll also be pulling for your friends. Through GyroSportsâ€™ referral program, players can win cash and prizes off their friendsâ€™ success. This creates a support network and social community unheard of in sports entertainment.
